member.name: IWbemShutdown.Shutdown
member.summary: The IWbemShutdown.Shutdown method indicates to the provider that the provider services are not required.
member.param: Reserved. This value must be zero (0).
Reserved. This value must be zero (0).
Reserved. This value must be NULL.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT, which identifies the status of the method call. The following list lists the value contained within an HRESULT.

summary.para: The IWbemShutdown interface indicates to the provider that an instance of an object is ready to be discarded. The provider can use this call to release resources that it is referencing currently.
The interface is used by providers to receive notification that their object implementation is no longer required.
